TopicTitle: [Request] Please add a "Remove All Debris" button

Articles.Content: As the title says, I'm sure I speak for anyone who likes to keep their systems free of random debris which serves no practical purpose, that we would welcome such a feature for the Space Center.
You can adjust how much debris there is, in options!
Yes, set the debris slider to zero in the settings and your debris problems will be solved.
Oh, awesome guys, thanks! I can't believe I overlooked something like that, hehe.
What happens to objects that you decouple? Technically they are "debris" immediately. Do they disappear as soon as you decouple them or only when you go back to the space centre?
I think they disappear once they leave draw range. They definitely don't disappear immediately after decoupling.

With no persistent debris enabled decoupled stuff hangs around until it's out of range and out of sight. Sometimes it hangs around while you orbit at longer ranges but as soon as you make a burn or switch to another ship, so long as it's out of range it'll unload.
